title: How to Manage Location Services Settings on iPhone and iPad

steps.title: Open the Settings app.
steps.content: Open the Settings app. This is the grey cog icon. [1] X Research source Make sure to update your iOS to the newest available version. If you can’t find the “Settings” app, swipe down on your home screen and enter "Settings" in the search bar.

steps.title: Tap Privacy & Security.
steps.content: Tap Privacy & Security . This will be in the third group of options, underneath Battery . [2] X Research source

steps.title: Tap Location Services.
steps.content: Tap Location Services . This will be at the very top of the page. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Toggle on "Location Services".
steps.content: Toggle on "Location Services". This will enable the feature. Location Services uses GPS, Bluetooth, Wi-Fi, and cell tower locations to determine your active location. [4] X Research source You can use Location Services for Find My , which can be used to find your iPhone , iPad, AirPods, or other connected Apple devices. You can also send your location to friends indefinitely or for a selected timeframe.

steps.title: Open the Settings app.
steps.content: Open the Settings app. This is the grey cog icon. [5] X Research source If you have Location Services turned on, you can manage the permission it has for each app.

steps.title: Tap Privacy & Security.
steps.content: Tap Privacy & Security . This will be in the third group of options, underneath Battery . [6] X Research source

steps.title: Tap Location Services.
steps.content: Tap Location Services . This will be at the very top of the page. [7] X Research source

steps.title: Tap an app.
steps.content: Tap an app. The apps will be listed below Share My Location in alphabetical order. Any app that uses Location Services will appear here.

steps.title: Set a permission.
steps.content: Set a permission. You can change the access permission at any point. [8] X Research source Select Never to disable Location Services completely for the app. Select While Using the App to limit Location Services to just when the app is open and active. Select Always to allow Location Services at all times. Select Ask Next Time Or When I Share to receive a pop-up request for access. On some delivery apps, such as DoorDash , you can toggle on or off Precise Location .
